mapper.insert: insert into transmission (id, start_user, jumper_port, jumper_position, link_one, link_two, local_port, open_path, channel_code, device_port, end_user, full_routing, remarks) values ( #{id}, #{startUser}, #{jumperPort}, #{jumperPosition}, #{linkOne}, #{linkTwo}, #{localPort}, #{openPath}, #{channelCode}, #{devicePort}, #{endUser}, #{fullRouting}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update:
update transaction
id=#{id},
start_user=#{startUser},
jumper_port=#{jumperPort},
jumper_position=#{id},
link_one=#{linkOne},
link_two=#{linkTwo},
local_port=#{localPort},
open_path=#{openPath},
channel_code=#{channelCode},
device_port=#{devicePort},
end_user=#{endUser},
full_routing=#{fullRouting},
remarks=#{remarks},
and start_user=#{startUser} and jumper_port=#{jumperPort} and channel_code=#{channelCode}
